summary: this is something for everyone out there that isn't confortable whit the shiny od their body
descriptionHtml:
first of al sorry english is not my mother languaje

this is basically a tutorial

first download a mod that change the wet texture of the body, but dowload it in zip. format.
once is download enter an go to ...texturesactorscharacterfemale...
there are three files that you want to use they are
>femalebody_1_s
>femalehands_1_s
>femalehead_s

>whit a program similar to photoshop open the three files and edit them changing their brightness

when its done edit the files in the skyrim directory and done

now your skyrim characters are wet as you want

hope it's work for everyone, at least for me it works
author: AnX24
